name: NEO 2045
description:
In the year 2045, Earth falls into destruction. And what causes it?? Evil robots, of course! This intergalactic robot threat is led by none other than LAZERTRON. Once an 8-bit character from an old, dusty computer game, LAZERTRON is now a self-proclaimed AI Overlord bent on taking over the entire universe!

Now, it’s up to you and your friends to battle it out with these pesky hunks of metal. They’re intelligent—but hunks of metal nonetheless! Give them a good blast!

Where can you stand your ground, you may ask? None other than in a faraway solar system...

Lucky for you guys, you managed to escape Earth and crash land into the vast pulls of NEO—an undiscovered planet teeming with riches...and danger.

All that’s left for you to do now is to build your new home, make new friends, and learn new battle skills. On planet NEO, your imagination and thirst for space adventure are the limits!

Customize the Ultimate Avatar
Your NEO journey starts with creating the oh-so-awesome avatar. With fully customizable facial features, clothing, and accessories, no two Explorers will look exactly alike! As the game progresses, you’ll gain new items to add to your already-snazzy wardrobe.

Create Your Own World
NEO is all about letting your imagination take you to new heights. Build the realm of your dreams and invite your friends over to this awesome world of yours. You can even craft, code, and terraform! Nothing more satisfying than winning battles with the help of your trusty bots, machines, and pets!

Explore New Realms
There’s always a new corner to discover here in NEO. Explore snowy tundras, luscious forests, and vast space biomes. Careful though—you never know what critter or asteroid you might run into! But thank the stars! You can always gather your gears at the community realm!

Socialize With Fellow Explorers
The fun never stops here in NEO! Dance battles get wild...and pizza parties get even WILDER! With a wide range of socialization features (chat boxes, emoticons, friend lists...to name a few), you’ll be forming cosmic connections with your fellow Explorers in no time.

Compete in Mini Games
Looking for some quick thrills? Compete—or team up—in exhilarating mini games and eSports leagues! Squad battles against your friends or robot enemies are just the beginning. Come out on top in games like Block Out, Drone Race, Battle Tank, Future Soccer, and many more!
